description_text:
Ho comprato pedaliera completa di motori pro però con il software simsonn
su LMU ultimate non c'è compatibilità in nessun modo ...
Crash delle vibrazioni o scollegamento volante....
Chiedo istruzioni per fare funzionare senza problemi

conversations.body_text: Hi andrea corona,  Please use nylon spacers and nylon screws to mount the VAM motor. This is intended to electrically isolate the motor from the mounting bracket, helping to prevent interference with the pedals. Additionally, you can use SimHub to enable telemetry-based vibration effects.

L'ho fatto ho messo sia le guarnizione in nylon che la messa a terra su
centralina ... I motori sia con il vostro software che con SIM hub vanno in
tilt ... Si bloccano e vibrano all infinito.. oppure scollegano
direttamente il servo volante ( thrustmaster tgt2)
Qualche idea ?

Il lun 29 dic 2025, 02:53 service@simsonn.com

Hi andrea corona,  If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
